title: Complete information about the interpretation of a dream about cutting off a finger in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cutting a finger in a dream. The world of dreams is a vast world with many very important connotations and messages, which can bring you a lot of good, but what is the interpretation of a dream about cutting a finger in a dream? It is one of the frightening dreams for many, because it indicates cutting off one’s relatives and abandoning prayer, and we will learn in detail the interpretation of this vision with an Egyptian website. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a finger in a dream. Many dream interpretation scholars say that fingers mean family, offspring, father, children, money, and kingship. Some said that they refer to the five prayers, so the thumb indicates the dawn prayer, the index finger indicates the noon prayer, the middle indicates the afternoon prayer, and the little finger indicates the prayer. Ibn Shaheen says that the finger represents children, sisters, and unity, so seeing its cutting represents differences and problems between brothers and relatives. Seeing fingers intertwined The hand is a praiseworthy vision that shows the fortuneteller’s insight into the connection of relatives and the strength of the bond between parents and siblings, as well as expressing his desire to perform duties and maintain the five daily prayers. The appearance of a new finger on the hand is a promising vision that expresses increased sustenance, the dreamer’s strength and his ability to earn, In addition to the strength of the bond between the dreamer and his family. If the dreamer sees that he cut off his finger, but it grows back and returns to good health, then this indicates strength after weakness and the return of family ties after disobedience and tyranny, as well as wealth after poverty and guidance after disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a finger by Ibn SirinNarrated by Ibn Sirin The vision indicates the severing of the family or that the dreamer has disobeyed his parents, because it expresses the dreamer’s neglect of his children, delaying prayer, and turning away from God Almighty. If the dreamer sees that he cannot move his fingers, this means that he has a group of siblings and children who cannot bear responsibility. And they cannot support him. Amputation of a finger means the loss of one of the children or their trip abroad, but if the dreamer is suffering from an illness, it is a vision that expresses the approaching condition of his condition. It is possible that you bump into your fingers and hear their sound, as this is evidence of the betrayal of a friend or the presence of a group of relatives and parents who They seek to tarnish your reputation, so you should always be on the alert. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing the middle finger cut off means the death of the ruler, the head of the family, or the head of the family. If the dreamer sees that the king has amputated his finger, this means that he will be removed from office, either If a new finger appears to him, this means an increase in injustice, oppression, and greed. Your dream will be interpreted in seconds on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website by Google. Interpretation of a dream about cutting off a finger for a single woman. Seeing unmarried people cutting off the finger of the left hand is a sign of a major problem with one of the sisters that may lead to it being cut off. Her relationship with them. As for cutting off the finger of the right hand, it is evidence of the girl’s negligence in her duties. She must pay attention to this matter and reconsider her relationship with God Almighty. Seeing the perfection of the fingers of the right hand indicates the girl’s good morals and her willingness to perform duties. If an unmarried woman sees that she cares a lot about her fingers Her left hand, this

title: Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a high place has many associations and dreamers for many people, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic given to us by our esteemed scholars. Let us read the following. What does falling from a high place mean in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place indicates The many difficulties that the dreamer is experiencing at that time, which puts him under severe psychological pressure. If a person sees in his dream that he is falling from a height, this is a sign of his desire to achieve many of his dreams, but he faces many obstacles that prevent him from doing so. If he sees While the dreamer is sleeping falling from a high place and running away from danger, this means that he has achieved his goal and will feel very happy about it. Seeing the dreamer falling from a high place in the mosque symbolizes abandoning the bad habits that he was constantly doing and asking for forgiveness for what he did. Interpretation of a dream Falling from a high position by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees in a dream falling from above and breaking as a sign of many negative changes that will occur in his life and will make him feel very upset. In the event that the dreamer sees in his dream that he is falling from above, this is a sign of extreme anxiety. Which he feels at that time because he is on the verge of new things that do not guarantee that the results will be his. Favoritism. Seeing someone during his sleep falling from a high place symbolizes going through many changes that will be decisive and radical in many aspects of his life. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is falling from a high place, this expresses his inability to achieve many of the things he had set out to achieve. He is trying to implement it. Interpretation of the dream of falling from a high place by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq interprets the dreamer’s dream of falling from a high place as a sign that he will face many problems that will exhaust him greatly until he gets rid of them. If a person sees in his dream that he is falling from a great height without being harmed, then this It means that he will face his fears and overcome them soon. If the dreamer sees himself falling from a height during his sleep, this indicates his inability to achieve his goals due to the many obstacles he faces. Seeing the dreamer falling from a high place symbolizes bad events that will occur in his life and will disturb him a lot. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place for single people: Seeing an unmarried woman falling from a high place in a dream means that she is coming to a period filled with many changes in all aspects and she is very worried that this will not be in her best interest. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that she is falling from a high place without... Any damage, this is a sign that she has overcome an important problem that greatly aggravated it. In the event that the dreamer sees in her dream that she is falling from a height and is alive, this indicates that she has received an offer of marriage from a person who is very suitable for her and she will agree immediately. Seeing a girl falling from a height In her dream, it symbolizes that her coming days will be filled with many good events. Interpretation of a dream about falling from a high place for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is falling from a high place, this is evidence

title: I dreamed that they told me that you were pregnant, so what is the interpretation of the dream?

preview.html: I dreamed that they told me that you are pregnant. In fact, the news of pregnancy is one of the news that makes those who hear it happy and is a cause of joy and happiness for them. As for seeing someone telling the dreamer that he is pregnant in a dream, it is good or there is another food behind. In the following lines, we will explain the details to reassure the reader's heart. I dreamed that they told me that you are pregnant. Seeing someone telling the dreamer that she is pregnant in a dream indicates the good luck that she will enjoy in the coming years and her life will turn from sadness and pain to happiness and prosperity. To demolish her stability and destroy her home page. Seeing someone telling a girl that she is pregnant in a dream leads her to achieve and fulfill her desires in life so that she has an excellent position in society at a later age and learning the news of her dreaming pregnancy in her sleep through someone symbolizes her knowledge of a set of information that will be the reason for her obtaining a lot of money as a result of the success of her previous projects. I dreamed that I was told that you are pregnant by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing someone telling the dreamer that she is pregnant in a dream indicates the good news that will reach her soon and fill her life with happiness and joy. As a result of her patience and resistance to the hardships and crises that hindered her life in the previous days. Seeing someone telling a girl in a dream that she is pregnant leads to the end of the financial crisis that she suffered because of it and prevents her from advancing in her professional life due to her weak personality and she will live in bliss and reassurance, and someone tells the dreamer that she is pregnant in her sleep, which symbolizes her liberation from the calamities that she created for her and she will enjoy many benefits in the coming period. The Secrets of Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed that I was told that you are pregnant in a single woman. Seeing someone telling an unmarried woman that she is pregnant in a dream indicates the imminent conclusion of her marriage contract in the coming period that she has been waiting for for a long time, and she will live with him in happiness and love, and knowing the news of pregnancy in a dream for the sleeper indicates the happy news that will reach her next time and the crises that will be resolved that hindered her life in the past due to the scammers around her and the magic of her relatives. Seeing someone telling a girl that she is pregnant in a dream leads her to get rid of the worries and sorrows that negatively affected Her psychological state in the previous period, and knowing the news of pregnancy in a girl's sleep symbolizes that she will do so in the coming days. She gets a great reward in her work as a result of her diligence and performance of what is required of her efficiently and easily. I dreamed that I was told that you are pregnant with a married woman. Seeing someone telling a married woman that she is pregnant in a dream indicates the goodness and blessings that will prevail in her life as a result of avoiding worldly temptations and temptations and approaching the path of truth until her Lord is pleased with her. The entry of others into her private life to spoil it. Seeing someone telling the dreamer that she is pregnant in a dream indicates her ability to raise her children in law and religion and support her husband on the path of excellence until he overcomes the difficulties and obstacles

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a dead mouse from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of a dream about a dead mouse in the house

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead mouse has many meanings, ranging from good, which promises goodness and prosperity, to evil, which warns of imminent danger, as the mouse is a rodent that is distinguished by its cunning and symbolizes poverty in the home, but it is characterized by being quick to hide and escape from the trouble of lightness, and the interpretation of a dead mouse varies according to its color, appearance, and location. What was the interpretation of a dream about a dead mouse? A dead mouse in a dream. It has many interpretations ranging between good and evil, depending on the color of the mouse and the place where it was found dead. If the mouse was in the workplace, this is an indicator On the viewer’s ability to outperform his competitors in his field of work and reach large and high administrative positions. Also, seeing a dead mouse on the road may indicate that the dreamer will face some obstacles and difficulties on his way to achieving his dreams, but he will overcome them with a little patience and determination. As for the dead gray mouse It indicates recovery from the disease and getting rid of that disease that afflicted the fortuneteller’s body in the recent period. While the black rat in the house is considered evidence of getting rid of the crises and disagreements that the dreamer faced in his personal life or between him and his loved one, perhaps from his family. What is the interpretation of a dream about the death of a mouse? Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that the mouse is a sign of hunger, disease and poverty, so its death is a sign of overcoming all these problems or eliminating them forever. It also portends victory over enemies and those with bad intentions and the elimination of evil forces that were a major threat to the dreamer’s life and worried His thoughts constantly. But if the dreamer is the cause of the death of the mouse, then this indicates the good personal qualities of the dreamer that allow him to achieve the highest leadership positions. Why do you wake up confused when you find your interpretation Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Interpretation of a dream of a dead mouse for a single woman This vision is a signal to start work for her owner In the dream, it portends the end of all obstacles and the release of the personalities that prevented her from achieving her dreams and living her life freely. This vision also expresses the girl’s desires regarding the desire to get rid of those obsessions and negative thoughts that she is constantly exposed to and lose her ability to enjoy her life. It also prepares a message of peace to give her Comforting and telling her that she will achieve her goals because she has determination and determination to excel. But if she sees that the mouse has died after she hit and killed it, this indicates that she will be able to overcome the obstacles she faces at work because of some scoundrels and conquer them with her strength and cunning. Whereas if the dead mouse is white, This is a sign of the end of her good feelings towards that deceitful person who caused her a lot of psychological pain and emotional trauma. Interpretation of a dream about a dead mouse for a married woman: This vision carries many interpretations, some of which warn of unpleasant events in the future, but it also heralds goodness and some good news. If the mouse dies as a result of the blow, this indicates that it will find appropriate solutions to those problems that were

title: Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for an unmarried woman from Ibn Sirin. Dreams are defined as a series of visual fantasies consisting of a series of scenes and situations that a person dreams about at night during his sleep and which, although not related to reality, appear very logical and realistic in dreams where the person feels as if they are. In reality, it is not just a dream that ends with the sleeping person waking up. Some scholars have attributed the reason for its appearance to the person’s secret desire for certain things to happen in his dreams due to the difficulty of achieving them in reality, or it may be a group of things that the person is occupied with during them. The day that came and was embodied in the form of some interconnected situations, but in all cases, dreams are always a mirror of human reality and carry within them many secrets that symbolize certain things in his future. Therefore, today we show you the interpretation of sweets in one dream by Ibn Sirin from the Encyclopedia website Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream of a lot of sweets for single women. Ibn Sirin pointed out that seeing sweets in a person’s dream is something worthy of praise, as his vision shows an abundance of livelihood in the form of money or children, and it can also mean good speech, flirtation, or kisses. Eating sweets in a dream is generally attributed to being glory, luxury, and joy in life, as sweets taste good and bring happiness to the soul of the one who eats them, as they are the food of the rich and wealthy. Seeing an unmarried woman buying sweets in a dream means that she feels love and admiration for someone. Whereas in If an unmarried woman gives someone a sweet piece in a dream, this is evidence of her great love and affection for this person. Seeing sweets in general in a person’s dream means happy news and happy events in his life, which may indicate excellence in his academic life or that he is going through a new state of love. It may also be good news that the date of marriage will be soon, God willing. Ibn Sirin also said: Seeing sweets and sugar in a dream is good and abundant, selling them is good and a blessing, and eating them in abundance in a dream indicates restlessness and illness, as it happens in reality. Eating sweets In a dream for a single woman, Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of eating sweets in an unmarried woman’s dream as good news and great goodness for the girl. It can also indicate enjoyment of religion, morals, good appearance, and abundant knowledge. It may also indicate that God Almighty will give her a good husband with a good nature, with whom she will be happy. In her married life. To dream of eating sweets for single people indicates affection and love and that God Almighty will give her a lot of halal money as a result of her stress and diligence in her work, which will help her improve her financial situation. Eating sweets can also indicate the happy and stable emotional state that she enjoys. A single person with one of the people with whom he deals romantically. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating sweets with love and enjoying its taste, this is a sign of

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a separate surah in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: Seeing Surah Faseel in a dream, then Surah Faseel is one of the Qur’anic surahs that God Almighty revealed to His Noble Prophet Muhammad, may God bless him and grant him peace. The goodness of the dreamer is due to his different social and psychological status, and many interpretation scholars, including Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin, have worked to clarify the interpretations contained in these dreams. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Fasil in a dream. Hearing the verses of the Holy Qur’an and its surahs in a dream is considered a praiseworthy vision, according to what Interpretation scholars have agreed upon this, and these visions carry many interpretations and connotations, ranging from positive to warning. title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish: In a dream, the vision carries many clues, and some believe that all the clues are good, as fish is one of the most important foods that provide the body with many benefits, and the interpretation of fried fish in one dream differs from the interpretation. From seeing it in the dream of a married or pregnant woman, so we present the most important of these interpretations through the following article. Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish by Ibn Sirinima Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish? Seeing fried fish is clear evidence of goodness entering and living in the life of the dreamer, and whoever has suffered difficulties Financial and saw in his dream a table of fried fish, the dream indicates abundant livelihood or gaining an inheritance that helps improve the financial situation. The dreamer who suffers from infertility saw during his sleep fried fish that smells good and tastes delicious. Fried fish indicates improved social conditions for the viewer. Eating fried fish In a dream with relatives, it indicates that one of them will recover from a serious illness that he suffered from for a long time and indicates the achievement of goals. What is the interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin says that large, soft fried fish symbolizes money and happiness. Eating fish in a dream for a fiancée indicates On the approach of her marriage, it is also said that seeing fried fish means alleviating and paying off debts. Fried fish indicates that the dreamer will obtain a benefit in the near future, provided that this benefit is financial, and in the case of an absent person whom the dreamer longs for, seeing fried fish symbolizes the return of that person. Absent. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that seeing white fried fish with good taste is evidence of profit. Interpretation of a dream about fried fish by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq said: Whoever sees fried fish in his sleep on his table, and eats it until his stomach is full and satisfied, then the dream is a symbol of achieving goals and a good condition. A merchant who sees during his sleep a dish containing fried fish, the dream indicates a trip with a good person. However, if the merchant sees himself frying fish, this vision indicates cooperation with a tired person, which means that collusion will be a loss for him. The burnt fried fish that The fortuneteller himself taking it out of the frying pan is a sign of strife. Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish for a single woman. Fried fish in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that the dreamer will get something that he has been waiting patiently for a long time to get and indicates the fulfillment of desires. Fried fish for individuals is a good dream and a sign of Things will become easier and she may soon marry a well-off man. Whoever sees in her dream that she is frying fried fish and mixing it with hot oil, the dream indicates that she is causing controversy and causing problems among people. Eating fried fish in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her relationship with a good young man, as It indicates happiness in her love life. Interpretation of a dream about eating fried fish for a married woman. Eating fried fish in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees fried fish in her dream and does not prepare it herself is a sign of abundant wealth as well as available fish. Eating fried fish

title: Interpretation of a whale in a dream - To see a whale in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a whale for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, for a man, a whale, the great whale by Ibn Sirin, by Imam Al-Sadiq. The whale in a dream is considered one of the very frightening and frightening dreams that we see in a dream and it afflicts the dreamer with great fear in order to obtain the correct interpretation, as it That the whale is one of the marine predators of the planet, since it is one of the largest and most powerful animals ever, and sometimes we see a whale attacking us, or we encounter a whale in the sea, which puts a person in a great state of fear. The great interpreter Ibn Sirin, the interpreter of dreams, explained to us that seeing a whale in A dream is evidence of many meanings, which we will present to you in interpretations in all their forms and complete meanings, which you can obtain. Interpretation of a dream about a whale: A whale refers to a vision in a dream on the right. Perhaps he was showing his vision of the temple of the righteous and the faithful in the mosque. It may indicate restlessness, sadness, loss of status, and the onset of anger. Seeing the whale of Yunus, peace be upon him, in a dream means safety for the fearful, wealth for the poor, comfort for the one in distress, and kingship for the one who deserves a king. I also see the prison of Joseph, peace be upon him, and a cave, inscription, and illumination of Noah, peace be upon him. If you dream of seeing a whale approaching a ship, this means that you will face a conflict between duties and threaten to lose property. If Pisces is destroyed, you will happily separate right from wrong and meet exciting success. If you see a whale overturning a ship, you will fall into a vortex of disaster. The whale in a dream has many interpretations. There are some positive interpretations and some are undesirable, and this depends on seeing the whale in a dream and the way you see it * It indicates anxiety and sadness sometimes. If one sees the whale that swallowed our Lord Yunus, this indicates the wealth and abundant power of the poor. Interpretation of a whale in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a brown whale in a dream is evidence of the fulfillment of an important desire in life. An unmarried girl who sees a whale in a dream indicates that her desire will come true in the near future. A girl buying a fish in A dream is evidence of an upcoming marriage. If a person sees in a dream that he is buying fish, this is a sign of the abundance of goodness that will come to him. Seeing a Pisces girl in a dream is a sign of marriage and getting married. For a whale to devour a girl in a dream is evidence of her engagement to a malicious and evil person. Escaping from A whale for a girl is evidence of her problems and that she has survived. Seeing a married woman in a dream indicates the birth of a child soon. A married woman who sees a whale in a dream indicates pregnancy and that she will soon give birth to a healthy child. A whale in a dream for a married woman is evidence of kindness. Seeing a married woman in a dream is A sign of continuing problems and troubles in life. Dreaming of a whale in a dream for a married woman is evidence of kindness and sustenance coming to her and her husband. Seeing a woman buying fish in a dream is a sign of buying a big house. Seeing a woman buying fish in a dream is a sign of radical change. Seeing a whale in The dream is evidence of stability in a long life. Seeing a whale in a dream is for a matzo woman

title: Interpretation of a dream about a house by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a new house in a dream

preview.html: To see a house in a dream indicates great livelihood and great profit, and other interpretations, we will explain them to an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, for example. A new, spacious house, buying a house, entering a house by Ibn Sirin, and more in the continuation of the topic: Interpretation of a house in a dream. A dream house is like a wife to a man and she is the one he takes refuge in. If she gets married, it is said that she enters his house, and the house refers to the man’s body, and whoever sees that he has built a new house, he will recover. If he is sick and marries a single man or marries his daughter. And whoever rises above an unknown house will disturb a woman, and whoever dreams that he is locked in a house among the houses and is entrusted with its door closed, will attain well-being and goodness. And whoever dreams of it. He dreams that he leaves his small house, he will be freed from his care, and whoever sees a spacious mud house in his house, then she is a good woman. And whoever sees that he is in a country and builds forts and houses in it, he will marry in that country and have children from it. And whoever dreams that his house is illuminated, he will travel in it and find Kindness, and a house in a dream means privacy, security, and comfort. The roof of the house indicates logic and thought, and the basement indicates the subconscious. Whoever sees in his dream that he lives in an empty house, and this house is full in reality, this indicates that he desires liberation and living independently, A new house in a dream indicates a new era in life, and whoever sees in a dream that he is poor that he has entered a new house full of amenities and is visible, and among the houses he will obtain a lot of money, and if he is rich, he will become richer. Whoever sees that he has a house of gold, his house will burn. And whoever sees a house built of brick or plastered in his house, then she is a hypocritical and strong woman, and if there is a basement under the house, then he is evil, and if the house is made of clay, then he is cheating on religion, and whoever tolerates a house or walks with it, the house has the wife’s livelihood. A dark house represents a bad woman with bad character, and whoever dreams that he enters a house sprinkled with water, the woman will torture him with the amount of mud and dampness, then he will leave. And it will be repaired. Whoever dreams that his house is dark travels far away without pleasure or benefit, and whoever sees in his dream that his house is being demolished, someone else will inherit his money, and whoever sees in his dream that the house is empty, this indicates a loss of a sense of security. And whoever sees changes in his house in a dream, this indicates On a change in his thoughts and personality, and whoever dreams that someone has invaded his house indicates that someone will break into his house. And whoever sees in his dream that he built a house other than his own and a sick person dies because it is the place of his grave. Interpretation of the house in Ibn Sirin’s dream: Whoever sees it as if he entered a new house, or his A house in which everything was new and perfect, including the furniture, or he had seen it from the outside, had a beautiful appearance, loved it, and was in a place he knew. His trade, and if it is his concern, his sadness and anxiety will be relieved, and it will turn into happiness and joy, and if he is sick, he is satisfied with the permission of his Lord, but if he has been disobedient and repents of the sin, then he will ask forgiveness, God willing, according to the beauty and beauty of the house that he saw during his pregnancy. It is said that a man builds a new house. Because he enjoys a high status and status with his people, and because he gathers or meets with his family and friends

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the entire ear being cleaned in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with an explanation of how to dream that you are cleaning the ear, from the books of major scholars in interpreting dreams and visions, and cleaning the ear in dreams, from what some people mentioned in their dreams. In a complete dream, we also give you a complete interpretation of cleaning the ear in a dream for general women, married women, pregnant women and men. If you are interested in knowing why you dream of cleaning the ear in a complete dream, just follow the rest of the article. To clean your ear in a dream Al-Osaimi. The dream interpretation expert Al-Osaimi indicated that the dream of cleaning the ears is one of the dreams that portends good things. Also, the dream of cleaning the ears is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of his worries. And his problems and improves his situation. To see the ear being purified and removing dirt from it, this indicates the purification of his life and the departure of those who do not deserve it. Seeing a person’s ear completely clean in a dream is a harbinger of happiness, promotion and positive changes in his life. Why does a single woman dream of cleaning her ears? Why dream of removing dirt from a woman’s ear Alone - to a wave of goodness and happiness and a way out of problems and troubles. Also, the interpretation of completely cleaning the ears in a dream for a common woman is one of the visions that she wishes for her upcoming marriage. Cleaning the ear of a single woman in a dream completely means that she will get rid of evil people and envious people. Seeing a girl completely cleaning her ear In a dream, it is a sign that she will return from bad deeds and will bring her closer to God Almighty. Why does a married woman dream of cleaning her ear? Completely cleaning a married woman’s ear in a dream is evidence of an improvement in her condition and an end to the disputes and troubles that she has suffered from. Why do you dream that you are removing dirt from a married woman’s ear from visions? Hamida indicates cleanliness, cleanliness, religiosity, and good morals. Seeing how a husband cleans his ears in a dream is an increase in kindness, strength, determination, and her ability to bear the responsibility of a woman. Why do you dream of cleaning a pregnant woman’s ears? A dream about cleaning a pregnant woman’s ears is evidence of an improvement in her condition and the cessation of the problems she suffers from. A dream about cleaning a child’s ears for a pregnant woman is a sign that she will give birth to a child who is healthy and free of diseases. A dream about cleaning a pregnant woman’s ears indicates that good and happy things will happen and that she will emerge from her worries and sorrows. Seeing ear cleaning sticks in a dream Seeing ear cleaning sticks in a dream completed and carrying them between Your hands mean that the time is approaching in order to improve the dreamer’s condition. Why dream of cleaning the ear in a dream completely and the dreamer puts it in his mouth. The symbol of cleaning the ear in a dream, using cleaning sticks, is a good omen and a sign of joy.
